column4: I don't know if it's just my hardware, but when running Ubuntu on it, the hard drive seems to get really noisy
either the hard drive or graphics card
Fan noise?
yes
That would make sense.
so it's not an Ubuntu problem?  the last time I used this hardware for XP was a long time ago, but I don't remember it being this noisy
assuming you are strictly talking about the noise from your video card's fan.
, I think it's that
okay.  I'll look it up, thanks!
My fan usually will spin faster (get louder) when i run certain apps, specially games under XP, not sure what would case that under Ubuntu.
What video card?
not running anything particular on it though.  NVidia
compiz/etc ?
I'm sorry, compiz?
3D accelerated GUI
I think the screensaver is, but I turned that to a blank screen'
but that has been the case on previous sound problems
don't know how to fix it in Ubuntu though
Fix what problem?
noise caused by lack of 3D acceleration
try a different distro, see if it does the same thing, maybe its all in your head :p
nah, this is definitely noisy.  but I think I'm starting to find some articles now that I've narrowed it down, thanks
Nice, good luck.
